long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those who NEED to know a movie rating.

Ever seen a movie title and had that sudden urge to check out its rating on IMDb? Well now you have that ability right at your fingertips! No more having to do a google search for every single movie you see in order to get ratings.

Instructions:
Just install the extension and select a movie title. Right click and get the IMDb rating for the movie in a handy notification on your screen.
